name: Cat-Cow Stretch
setup: Start on hands and knees in tabletop position
Hands directly under shoulders, knees under hips
Neutral spine with head in line with spine
steps: Inhale, drop belly down and lift chest and tailbone up (Cow)
Create gentle arch through entire spine
Exhale, round spine up toward ceiling like angry cat
Tuck chin to chest and tailbone under
Return to neutral and repeat the flow
cues: Feel the stretch through entire spine
mistakes: Cranking the neck instead of moving spine
safety: Move gently and within comfortable range. Stop if any sharp pain in spine or wrists.

regressions: Use forearms instead of hands if wrist issues

prescriptionHints.notes: Focus on breath and smooth movement

joints.notes: Move gently and avoid forcing range. Use padding under knees if needed.
